France now backing EU AI rules, EU source says ahead of bloc endorsementFrance is now backing landmark European Union rules governing artificial intelligence subject to strict conditions, an EU diplomatic source said on Friday, after sources had previously said it was the last holdout in the bloc to support the plan.
